googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Ruth McKee
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Extremely happy with Southern Shores Plumbing Services! I’ve used him twice now. He’s extremely reasonable and does a quick and efficient job. I highly recommend using Austin!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Southern Shores Plumbing Services

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: nellie katz
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Amazing work! He's done some updates as well as fixed an emergency leak in my attic. Super grateful that he's friendly, trustworthy and charges reasonably. Will definitely call Southern Shores Plumbing if I need anything in the future!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Southern Shores Plumbing Services

photoRecords.description: A modern kitchen sink with a black matte faucet and a stainless steel undermount sink basin. The countertop appears to be a light-colored solid surface material.
A brushed nickel shower head with multiple spray patterns. The shower head has a contemporary design with a curved shape and numerous nozzles.
A tiled shower enclosure with white subway tiles on the walls and a black matte rain shower head in the ceiling. A decorative black hexagon tile accent is visible in the corner niche.
A bathroom vanity with a white solid surface countertop and a black matte faucet. The sink is an undermount style, and the backsplash features a decorative patterned tile.
A brushed nickel shower system with a rain shower head, a handheld shower wand, and multiple body spray jets. The shower enclosure is tiled with white subway tiles.
A plumbing manifold with multiple valves, gauges, and pipes. The manifold appears to be part of a residential plumbing system, likely for controlling water distribution or heating.
A white toilet with a standard flush tank, installed on a tiled floor with a brown/tan pattern.
A tiled shower stall with marble-patterned tiles, a shower head, and a built-in bench.
A crawl space under a house, with a drain pipe and debris visible on the ground.
Plumbing supplies and tools on the ground outside, including PVC pipes, a spray can, and a wrench.
A tiled shower stall with marble-patterned tiles, a shower head, and a built-in bench.
Exterior siding of a house, with plumbing pipes and fittings visible, including a pressure gauge.
A black shower valve trim kit installed on a tiled wall.
A curved shower rod installed in a tiled shower stall.

aboutUs: At Southern Shores Plumbing Services, we are a team of highly skilled and experienced plumbers dedicated to providing top-notch service to the Gulf Shores community and surrounding areas. Our expertise spans a wide range of plumbing services, from routine maintenance and repairs to complex installations and emergency situations. With a focus on local service and a deep understanding of the unique plumbing needs of coastal properties, we strive to deliver reliable and efficient solutions tailored to your specific requirements.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Unparalleled expertise and reliable service for all your plumbing needs in the Gulf Shores area.
sellingPoints: Highly trained and certified technicians with extensive experience in coastal plumbing challenges.
Rapid response times and 24/7 emergency service to ensure your plumbing issues are resolved promptly.
Commitment to using the latest techniques and equipment to deliver long-lasting, cost-effective solutions.
